message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.ST

This paper proposes a methodology for multi-armed bandit problems using Thompson sampling and Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods. The paper focuses on the theoretical analysis of the proposed algorithm and its computational complexity. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.IT (Information Theory). The paper also involves statistical analysis and concentration rates, which are relevant to cs.ST (Statistics) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
